The notion that transit is for lefties and cars are for conservatives is patently absurd. Writing off all public transit as Orwellian fascism is equally as stupid as me saying I won't drive my sedan because I'm not a libertarian.

In today's Ottawa Sun: "[Transit] is just another form of government intrusion where inconveniencing folks is secondary to the greater collective good." Good to know that, in the minds of some, cars (!) are weapons of right-wing ideology. Oh, and transit is for wusses. #onpoli
